thread.title: Michelle Lee reveals her intense exercise routine on 'Hello Counselor' | allkpop.com
thread.title_full: Michelle Lee reveals her intense exercise routine on 'Hello Counselor' | allkpop.com

title: Michelle Lee reveals her intense exercise routine on 'Hello Counselor' | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Michelle Lee reveals her intense exercise routine on 'Hello Counselor' By KpopJoA 1 hour ago 8,495 271 34 1 Google+ Singer Michelle Lee confessed her struggles with losing weight through KBS 'Hello Counselor' broadcasted on February 20.
The singer revealed, "Since I have a lot of muscles, I have to work extra hard to actually lose weight." She then added, "I have to do about 200 chin-ups as well as 200 push-ups," surprising the audience. 
MC Jung Chan Woo and Kim Tae Gyun commented, "Are you a professional athlete or something?" 
Meanwhile, guest member Park Hye Mi poked at Michelle's arms, impressed by her determination. YOU MAY LIKE GET AKP IN YOUR INBOX! ..or follow allkpop to stay updated: Tags: Meanwhile, I can't even do one push-up... 0 | Heyy, good for her! upper body strength is harder for females to attain 0 | View Profile 
BigBangVIP_NYC â€¢ 40 minutes ago It is a known fact that the majority of a black women are curvy. It could be that she inherited it from her dad side of the family. However, I'm sure the struggle is real. However, she should embrace these features. I'm black and I'm not curvy at all. Actually while growing up I was called "white people behind" all the time. I used to hate my small butt but as I grow older I've learned to embrace my small butt. In fact, I'm 5 "6" and weighs 135lbs...in America that's the weight a 4"11" person should weigh to be considered healthy. I didn't inherit my mom thick hips and big butt. Instead I inherited my dad's slimmer figure. I'm happy to say that I've learned to love my body. Hopefully she will embrace her heritage on the her dad side of the family and know that no matter what she does she'll probably always be a bit thick. She's beautiful and look so healthy!! 0 |
